column4: sup guys, my pc speaker is getting on my nervez, since I reinstalled it's firin' every time i press backspace on an empy text control. lsmod output: http://pastie.org/2797517
look at the output I gave
in sound settings you may be able to set the bell to no sound, or it may be an option in the terminal itself
I can disable it from specifically the terminal in the perferences, trouble is it's not just the terminal but every single application :(
